mapper.select: select studentId, day1Course1, day1Course2, day1Course3, day1Course4, day1Course5, day2Course1, day2Course2, day2Course3, day2Course4, day2Course5, day3Course1, day3Course2, day3Course3, day3Course4, day3Course5, day4Course1, day4Course2, day4Course3, day4Course4, day4Course5, day5Course1, day5Course2, day5Course3, day5Course4, day5Course5 from course where studentId = #{studentId}
